title: Tristana
body: What is everyone's opinion of tristana current state

replies.body: I want more tristy in my life :3 I already own the figures from roits store but I was thinking of getting maybe something like a tristy pillow >///<
She's fine? I play her a lot and find her quite fun to play :D
Its my opinion that she is super kawaii~ xD
